scenario_text.value: GRRRAAAAAAWR!!!

Miyuki! Hey, Miyuki!!!
...It’s no good, she can’t hear me!

*huff*... *huff*...
Argh, such an oppressive aura!
This is insane! She’s on a rampage over here!

Words won’t reach her anymore, Takuma!
We don’t have a choice...!

Yeah... Time to finish this!
Her followers are gone, we can do this!

Wait! If she’s gone, we won’t be able to get
home, you know?!

But if we let her go, who knows what’ll
happen next time we see her!
(What do we do about Miyuki?)
Do we have to fight?
I still wanna save her!
I think we should run.
have no choice?

(Kaito and Minoru are right. I can’t imagine
our voices reaching Miyuki like this.)

(And continuing to fight would just put
everyone in danger.)
But... But...
want to save her!
I still want to save Miyuki!

Don’t talk crazy!
That’s not on the table anymore!

Takuma, if this keeps up we’ll be the ones on
the chopping block!
But... But...
think we should run.

We can’t let Miyuki die! At the very least,
we should just run away now!

Are you even listening?! Even if we leave her
alone now, she’ll just come for us later!

I’m sorry, Takuma, but this is the only
option available to us...
No! We can’t...

Minoru, Kaito.
Won’t you give us more time?
You too, Professor?!

She regained consciousness for just a moment.
Surely our voices can reach her.
...I don’t want to lose anyone else.
So please, just a little more time...

...All right, but just a LITTLE, okay?!
But if things get dicey, I’m taking her out!
Ahh jeez... Fine, just do it already!

Thank you, truly.
Let’s go, Takuma.
Raaah!

Miyuki! Don’t you recognize us?!
These are people that care about you!

Please, you can’t lose! For Haru’s sake, too!
We’re going home together!

You can do it, Miyuki! You can beat it!
Then we can all go home!

So don’t lose, Miyuki!
Take that Master down!
Nnngh.... RRRAAAAAAAAAH!!!

Just a little more, Takuma!
Miyuki’s almost come back to her senses!
Miyuki! Miyuki!!!
AH... AHHH... TAKU...MA?
...Miyuki?!

NO... I...!
CAN I RETURN TO YOU ALL?

Yes, Miyuki! We’ll all go back to our world
together!
Takuma... I, I...
...GGGRAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!

It’s no good, Takuma!
She’s starting to go berserk!

Reinforcements inbound!
Damn it all!

I fear we won’t last much longer! What should
we do?!
RRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!
Miyuki... No, it can’t be!
Look out, Takuma!
WOOOOOOOOOH!!!
Gaaaugh...!
Jijimon?! Your chest... You’ve been stabbed!

Stop it, Miyuki!
Don’t hurt anyone else!

It’s too dangerous, Takuma!
Miyuki can’t be helped anymore!

We can’t stay here!
It’ll collapse at any moment!
Wait... Wait! What about Jijimon?!
Dammit... Jijimon!!!

No way, we can’t get any closer...!
We have to get out of here on our own!
But...!
Run... You must...go....
Jijimon!
I leave them... I leave everything to you...

No, Jijimon we’re... We’re supposed to do it
together!!!
No, Takuma! You’ll die, too!!!

Let go! I have to... I have to save Jijimon,
at least!

Drag Takuma over here!
We’ll escape through the hole Miu made!
I...I’ve got to...!
